title: Vendor Traffic Report
description: This report shares data on the customer traffic to the detail pages of the vendor's items both at an aggregated level (across the vendor's entire catalog of items) and at a per-ASIN level. Data is available for different date range aggregation levels: DAY, WEEK, MONTH, QUARTER, YEAR. Requests can span multiple date range periods.

startDate.description: The date when the data collection started

endDate.description: The date when the data collection ended

asin.description: Unique identifier for the Amazon Standard Identification Number

glanceViews.description: Total number of quick views on the product

dataEndTime.description: The timestamp indicating the end time of the data collection

queryEndDate.description: The date when the query for data collection ended
